subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Brewers ripped three home runs off Johan Santana, including a two-out, two-run blast by Gabe Kapler in the seventh that knocked him out, though he was hardly the only man responsible.
snippet: The Brewers ripped three home runs off Johan Santana, including a two-out, two-run blast by Gabe Kapler in the seventh that knocked him out, though he was hardly the only man responsible.
